body:
Hey guys, so recently I found out that my dog, Mia, has something wrong with her leg. She can barely walk on it and for the next few days, she has to have certain tablets and if it doesn't work, she has to have a $3,000 surgery to remove the problem.

Now I'm not asking for money, attention or sympathy. I am simply asking for your support and help over the next few weeks.

Cheers
Sheamus

title: Help Needed!

replies.body: I hope that Mia can get better soon!
